lead_paragraph: Investigators said they found a weapon and obtained surveillance camera footage connecting Oscar Morel to the crime, but could not yet say why the attack occurred.

headline.print_headline: Police Certain They Caught Imam’s Killer; No Motive Yet
headline.main: New York Police Certain They Caught Imam’s Killer; Motive Still a Mystery

snippet: Investigators said they found a weapon and obtained surveillance camera footage connecting Oscar Morel to the crime, but could not yet say why the attack occurred....
abstract: Police investigators say they are certain that suspect Oscar Morel shot and killed Muslim imam Alauddin Akonjee and his assistant Thara Miah in Queens based on evidence uncovered so far, but note that motive for attack is still unclear.
